title: Community is trash as Fk. AFK and trolls every game.
body:
1st game today, Yasuo goes 0/5, cries then leaves.
2nd game today, Malz mid, AFK from level 1
3rd game today, someone goes Blitz goes ADC.

Yet you refuse to hire an intern for $15/hr to help fix this shti.

replies.body:
Yisus,

Posts like this only help fuel the fire, it also just sheds a light on your attitude towards to game too. It appears you seem to have a sense of entitlement that you really shouldn't.
If you came into a  game with the attitude you've just shown, I'd be pretty disappointed too.

Go have a drink, take a breathe, walk away for a moment, then come back and try again.
There are some games where things just don't go to plan, and some people can't handle that. If this is normals, even more reason to just chill out and try enjoy yourself, even if you or your team is feeding. Do your best to make it hard for them to get the kills.

Hope your next game is a better experience for you.
DId someone apply for the intern role and get rejected? :3

Thats %%%%ing moba for you. No oldschool respect for gaming anymore. Not like in the old days. Back in the old country. Check out a game called Demigod, far greater game with a more mature audiance, greater strategic aspects. More interesting people.
This is what you get for AFKing.
